TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewImageKeyConverter extends System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image key to and from another data type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageKeyConverter> class is used to convert key values of an image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control to and from other data types. For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
> [!NOTE] > Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageKeyConverter>. Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class. For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
